name: tds-vscode
displayName: TOTVS Developer Studio for VSCode (AdvPL, TLPP e 4GL)

scripts.publish: npm run package && npx -y vsce publish
scripts.publish-prerelease: npm run package-prerelease && npx -y vsce publish --pre-release

enumDescriptions: Pergunta a cada compilação em lote.
Sempre apresenta a tabela de resultados.
Nunca apresenta a tabela de resultados.
Applies to all files on the workspace.
Applies only to files being edited.

keywordsCase.description: Coloca as palavras chaves da linguagem na caixa indicada

stringStyle.description: Indica como as _strings_ devem ser informadas.

commands.title: Show sources
commands.description: Show used sources in TDS-Replay file

commands.title: Run
commands.description: Launches TDS-Replay execution with default configuration.

commands.title: Argumentos
commands.description: Argumentos a serem repassados ao programa que será executado

programArguments.description: Arguments that will be passed to the called program/function (through key -A)

configurationSnippets.label: %tds.package.totvs_language_debug%
configurationSnippets.description: Configuration for debugging a user selected AdvPL/4GL file using _SmartClient_.

configurationSnippets.label: %tds.package.totvs_language_debug_with_arguments%
configurationSnippets.description: Configuration for debugging a fixed AdvPL/4GL file and user arguments using _SmartClient_.

tdsReplayFile.description: The TDS Replay File recorder by the server.

password.description: The password of the TDS Replay File

includeSources.description: The sources that must be included when importing the information. WildCards (*) can be used.

excludeSources.description: The sources that must be excluded when importing the information. WildCards (*) can be used.

selectedSources.description: Source filter to be applied to the timeline.

configurationSnippets.label: %tds.package.tdsreplay.debug%
configurationSnippets.description: A new configuration for debugging a TDS Replay file.

smartclientUrl.deprecationMessage: Enter only under guidance. Upon not informed, the URL will be assembled using the current server connection parameters.

ignoreFiles.description: Make the debugger ignore break events in files not found in WorkSpace

programArguments.description: Arguments that will be passed to the called program / function (key -A)

viewsWelcome.contents:
Register a Protheus server, please.
[Register Server](command:totvs-developer-studio.addServer)
To learn more about how to use this extension [read our docs](https://github.com/totvs/tds-vscode/blob/master/docs/welcome.md).

walkthroughs.title: Welcome: First Steps
walkthroughs.description: Initial configuration assistant for use of TDS-Vscode

steps.title: Open Folder
steps.description:
Open a folder or repository, containing Advpl or 4GL sources.
[Open Folder](command:workbench.action.files.openFolder)

steps.title: Register a Protheus Server
steps.description:
Register a Protheus Server, which will be responsible for the various steps and development processes.
[Add Server](command:totvs-developer-studio.addServer)

steps.title: The global search folder list
steps.description:
Enter the default list of locations to search for definition files (.CH, .TH e .R).
[Global Include](command:totvs-developer-studio.include)

steps.title: Select SmartClient
steps.description:
Select SmartClient Executable to be used in debugging when not informed in the launcher.
[Select SmartClient](command:totvs-developer-studio.selectSmartClient)

steps.title: Select SmartClient
steps.description:
Select SmartClient Executable to be used in debugging when not informed in the launcher.
[Select SmartClient](command:totvs-developer-studio.selectSmartClient)

steps.title: Select SmartClient
steps.description:
Select SmartClient Executable to be used in debugging when not informed in the launcher.
[Select SmartClient](command:totvs-developer-studio.selectSmartClient)
